statements: SELECT * FROM transportation WHERE id = 1
SELECT vehicle_name, capacity FROM transportation WHERE route = 'Route A'
SELECT id, vehicle_name FROM transportation WHERE capacity > 100
SELECT * FROM transportation WHERE vehicle_name LIKE '%Bus%'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM transportation
SELECT * FROM transportation ORDER BY capacity DESC
SELECT * FROM transportation WHERE route LIKE '%Highway%'
SELECT DISTINCT(route) FROM transportation
SELECT AVG(capacity) FROM transportation
SELECT MAX(capacity) FROM transportation
SELECT MIN(capacity) FROM transportation
SELECT SUM(capacity) FROM transportation
SELECT id, route FROM transportation WHERE capacity BETWEEN 50 AND 100
SELECT * FROM transportation WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT * FROM transportation WHERE route = 'Route B' OR route = 'Route C'
SELECT * FROM transportation WHERE capacity IS NOT NULL
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT(route)) FROM transportation
SELECT * FROM transportation WHERE vehicle_name = 'Car'
SELECT * FROM transportation WHERE route NOT LIKE '%Street%'
SELECT vehicle_name, COUNT(*) FROM transportation GROUP BY vehicle_name
SELECT id, vehicle_name, capacity FROM transportation LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM vehicles;
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_type FROM vehicles WHERE manufacturer = 'Toyota';
SELECT manufacturer, year FROM vehicles WHERE year > 2015;
SELECT * FROM routes;
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM routes WHERE start_location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM vehicles WHERE manufacturer = 'Ford' AND year > 2010;

SELECT DISTINCT manufacturer FROM vehicles;
SELECT AVG(year) FROM vehicles;
SELECT MAX(year) FROM vehicles;
SELECT MIN(year) FROM vehicles;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT manufacturer) FROM vehicles;
SELECT * FROM routes WHERE end_location = 'Los Angeles';
SELECT manufacturer, COUNT(*) AS vehicle_count FROM vehicles GROUP BY manufacturer;
SELECT * FROM vehicles WHERE year BETWEEN 2010 AND 2020;
SELECT route_name, COUNT(*) AS vehicle_count FROM routes GROUP BY route_name;
SELECT manufacturer, AVG(year) FROM vehicles GROUP BY manufacturer;
SELECT manufacturer, MAX(year) FROM vehicles GROUP BY manufacturer;
SELECT manufacturer, MIN(year) FROM vehicles GROUP BY manufacturer;
SELECT route_name, AVG(userID) FROM routes GROUP BY route_name;
SELECT manufacturer, COUNT(*), AVG(year) FROM vehicles GROUP BY manufacturer HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;

SELECT drivers.name, vehicles.name, routes.start_location, routes.end_location FROM drivers JOIN vehicles ON drivers.id = vehicles.id JOIN routes ON drivers.id = routes.id

SELECT * FROM routes WHERE id NOT IN (SELECT id FROM drivers)
